00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00008 
00009 void reverseErrors(MavenCompiler* c, int start, int len) {
00010         for(int i = start; i < (start + len) / 2; ++i) {
00011                 MavenError temp = c->errors[i];
00012                 c->errors[i] = c->errors[start + len - i - 1];
00013                 c->errors[start + len - i - 1] = temp;
00014         }
00015 }
